page.title: 15Trade
page.content: The only general grocery shop closed 7 years ago, but a certain amount of trading is transacted. S.& R.Gower, the wholesale & retail newsagents deliver daily from Whitepost Cottage. Two inns i.e. The Rock at the Hoath & the Bottle House on the boundary with Penshurst are popular. Two other enterprises are Smarts Hill Bakery, a family business who bake bread & cakes daily on the premises, delivering to homes & shops in neighbouring villages, & the Grove Vineyard, belonging to the Westphal family, whose wines are sold to most of the shops, inns & restaurants in the vicinity.
